name: Bouncing Slime - Impossible Levels
description:
- BOUNCING SLIME: IMPOSSIBLE LEVELS -
Do you live for the big challenge?
Play thIs new amazingly addicting game and its impossible levels!
It is deceivingly simple: just one control. Tap the screen to jump, guide your green slime over spikes and jump on platforms to get to the end of the level.
Be careful, any mistake will result in instant death and a respawn at the beginning of the level.

FEATURES:
• 40 impossible levels + 20 bonus levels + 30 reverse levels
• 4 different Slimes (unlock new slimes during the game)
• Multiple gameplays (discover gravity and speed variations)
• Fantastic 8 bit soundtrack and exceptional graphics
• Free updates incoming

Try to unlock all the Impossible Levels and beat your friends.
DON’T FORGET, TO MASTER THE CHALLENGE... NEVER GIVE UP!
